dual_autodiff Modules
======================

The following sections provide a detailed overview of the `dual_autodiff` package, including its key modules and functionality.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   dual_autodiff.dual
   dual_autodiff.base
   dual_autodiff.functions
   dual_autodiff.version

---

dual_autodiff.dual
==================
This module implements the `Dual` class, the core of the package. It defines dual numbers and their arithmetic and mathematical operations.

.. automodule:: dual_autodiff.dual
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
   :no-index:

---

dual_autodiff.base
==================
This module provides utility functions for handling dual numbers.

.. automodule:: dual_autodiff.base
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
   :no-index:

---

dual_autodiff.functions
=======================
This module contains global aliases for mathematical functions like `sin`, `cos`, and `log`.

.. automodule:: dual_autodiff.functions
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
   :no-index:

---

dual_autodiff.version
=====================
This module defines the version of the package.

.. automodule:: dual_autodiff.version
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
   :no-index:
